tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE ManufacturingProcess (id INT, item_name VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE ManufacturingHistory (id INT, item_id INT, status VARCHAR(50), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE ManufacturingStatus (status_id INT, status_name VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE shipping (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  destination VARCHAR(100),
  shipping_status VARCHAR(50),
  shipping_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
